name: Prototypical (Joseph Rehm)
description:
A prototype I made of movement mechanics in Unreal Engine. Alt + Tab to quit.

Controls (Mouse/Keyboard): Movement: WASD, Shoot: Left Mouse, Grapple Hook: Right Mouse, Jump/Double Jump: Space

Controls (Controller): Movement: Analog Sticks, Shoot: Right Trigger, Grapple Hook: Left Trigger, Jump/Double Jump: Bottom Face Button

Holding jump while touching a surface will let you climb some surfaces and wall run on others.
